articles.content: After many teasers, the Motorola Edge+ is finally going official in India. The flagship was released in the last month, however, due to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, and India’s lockdown the company had to postpone the launch in the country until now. Despit… [+1651 chars]

articles.title: Redmi forays into audio segment in India; teases new audio device - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Xiaomi’s value-driven Redmi brand has hinted that the company will enter India’s audio segment within weeks.
articles.content:
After a successful stint in the Indian smartphone market, Chinese device maker Redmi is foraying into the country's growing audio space. The Xiaomi sub-brand has dropped several hints that it may launch a new gadget in the coming weeks.

articles.title: iQOO Z1 is official with Dimensity 1000+ SoC and a 144Hz screen - Gizchina.com
articles.description: iQOO Z1 is official with Dimensity 1000+ SoC and a 144Hz screen. IQOO Z1 is the first smartphone based on the MediaTek Dimensity 1000+ with 5G support.
articles.content: Vivo has officially introduced IQOO Z1, the world’s first smartphone based on the MediaTek Dimensity 1000+ chipset with 5G support, which is based on the current generation of CPU (Cortex-A77) and GPU (Mali-G77). The new SoC model highlights support for a 144… [+2058 chars]
